mapper.select: select S.SPACE_NAME, H.H_NICKNAME, S.IMG_MAIN, S.SPACE_NO FROM SPACE S INNER JOIN USER_HOST H on S.id= H.id
select R.RESERVE_NO, R.REGIDATE, S.SPACE_NAME, R.RESERVE_PERSON, R.startDate, R.ENDDATE, R.TOTALPRICE from RESERVE R INNER JOIN SPACE S on R.SPACE_NO = S.SPACE_NO where R.reserve_no=#{rn}
select R.RESERVE_NAME, R.RESERVE_PHONE, R.RESERVE_EMAIL, R.ASK from RESERVE R inner join USER_NORMAL N on R.id = N.id where R.reserve_no=#{rn}

select SR.LEFTDAY8, SR.LEFTDAY7, SR.LEFTDAY6, SR.LEFTDAY5, SR.LEFTDAY4, SR.LEFTDAY3, SR.LEFTDAY2, SR.LEFTDAY1, SR.LEFTDAY0 from SPACE_REFUND SR inner join SPACE S on SR.SPACE_NO = S.SPACE_NO where S.SPACE_NO=#{sn}
select space_name, address, phone from space where space_no=#{sn}

select RC.REGIDATE, R.totalprice, R.startdate, R.enddate,R.RESERVE_PERSON, TO_DATE(R.startdate)-(SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') "NOW" FROM DUAL) as diff, case when TO_DATE(startdate)-(SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') "NOW" FROM DUAL) = 0 then totalprice*0.2 when TO_DATE(startdate)-(SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') "NOW" FROM DUAL) = 1 then totalprice*0.3 when TO_DATE(startdate)-(SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') "NOW" FROM DUAL) = 2 then totalprice*0.4 when TO_DATE(startdate)-(SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') "NOW" FROM DUAL) = 3 then totalprice*0.5 when TO_DATE(startdate)-(SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') "NOW" FROM DUAL) = 4 then totalprice*0.6 when TO_DATE(startdate)-(SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') "NOW" FROM DUAL) = 5 then totalprice*0.7 when TO_DATE(startdate)-(SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') "NOW" FROM DUAL) = 6 then totalprice*0.8 when TO_DATE(startdate)-(SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') "NOW" FROM DUAL) = 7 then totalprice*0.9 else totalprice end as refundprice, RC.CANCEL_COMMENT from reserve R inner join reserve_cancel RC on RC.RESERVE_NO=R.RESERVE_NO where R.RESERVE_NO=#{rn}

select S.space_name, H.H_NICKNAME, S.IMG_MAIN, R.RESERVE_NO, S.SPACE_NO, R.status, R.regidate from USER_HOST H INNER JOIN SPACE S on H.id = S.id inner join reserve R on S.SPACE_NO = R.SPACE_NO inner join user_normal N on R.id = N.id where N.N_NICKNAME = #{nickname} order by R.regidate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVE values( SEQ_RESERVE.NEXTVAL, #{reserve_name}, #{reserve_phone}, #{reserve_email}, '0', #{reserve_person}, default, #{ask}, #{space_no}, (select id from user_normal where n_nickname=#{reserve_name}), #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{totalprice} )
mapper.select: select S.SPACE_NO, R.reserve_no, R.status from space S inner join reserve R on S.space_no = R.space_no where R.id=(select id from user_normal where N_NICKNAME = #{nickname})

select SRI.MIN_DAY,SRI.MAX_DAY, SRI.MIN_PERSON, SRI.MAX_PERSON, SRI.PRICE_STANDARD, SRI.PRICE_WEEKDAY, SRI.TIME_OR_DAY, SRI.OPER_TIME, SRI.REGULARLY_CLOSE from space_reserve_info SRI inner join space S on SRI.space_no=S.space_no where S.space_no=#{sn}
